structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - STREET AND SIDEWALK STANDARDS

text.section: Major and minor thoroughfares, fifty-three (53) feet (16.6 meters) or more;

Residential collector street, thirty-six (36) feet (10.97 meters), but forty-one (41) feet (12.50 meters) within three hundred (300) feet of a collector street or thoroughfare system roadway intersection.
Minor residential street, twenty-six (26) feet (7.92 meters). (Ord. No. 1987-69, ยง4, 10-20-87; Ord. No. 1995-760-TC-122, ยง5, TC-20C-95, 11-21-95)
